Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Seahawks players burned the American flag.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of the Seahawks player by stating that they burned an American flag.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a widely circulated picture that was altered.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the altered picture accurately represents the actions of the Seahawks player.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that the picture was altered and that the Seahawks player did not burn the American flag.
